impressive fireplaces, new wood blinds, and upgraded flooring throughout.', "You'll love our interior features such as cozy wood-burning fireplaces, full-sized washers and dryers, spacious closets, and designer details.", 'Enjoy our beautiful community entertainment room featuring a big screen TV and luxury kitchen, or hang out at the outdoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, and 24-hour fitness center.',
